title: Is this ok?
body:
So I took my #wins divided it by total games played and came up with 45%. Is this ok? I pretty much only play blind normals so I can't take dc's, afk's, and remakes into account. well I could take remakes, but I'm not going to sift through my entire match history, just looking for opinions.

Thanks.

replies.body:
if wins / total =  0.45, than yes, you have a 45% winrate.

It is only meaningful over a large sample size, say 200+ games.

470 games, a handful of premades and never a full 5 members. thanks for reading but is 45% good? I'm obviously asking people that have played a lot of solo blind normal because well it has it's circumstances, heh.

Well.. the average is 50%, logically. It cant be anything else.

In order to get 45% after considering random luck, you have to be consistently dragging down your team somehow, or just clowning around. It is pretty bad, but nowhere near as bad as a lot of people i see freefalling through silver.
